description: After urgent consultations and reviewing Halden's secret journal, Rada Miskovic resolves to reveal the existence of an amnesty protocol designed to reset the BCI and force radical change.

Rada airs a live exposé revealing Halden's hidden amnesty mechanism. Instantly, thousands of previously marginalized residents receive top-tier BCI privileges while former loyalists are restricted. Citywide shock and celebration erupt; trust in the system unravels.
Oksana Lintz publicly traces the citywide upheaval to Halden’s 'amnesty protocol,' confirming it was built as a safeguard against Council misuse. The motive and timing fuel intense public debate.
The Directorate blames Innovators for exploiting the amnesty for political leverage, while factions splinter and argue over Halden’s true intentions. Council authority weakens visibly.
Marginalized neighborhoods celebrate their new status, while protests swell among former high-score residents demanding lost privileges be reinstated. Calls grow for a total rethink of the BCI era.
